page.title: 05A Farmers Day
page.content: Mr and Mrs Williams live at Pentre Mill Farm. At 6.30 am the farmer gets up and goes out to milk the cows then at 7.00 am he wakes up the rest of the {family.}While breakfast is being prepared others are feeding the poultry and dogs. After breakfast the cows are moved out into the fields. This is a slow job which can take up to an hour. Next the sheep are rounded up and counted and feed then returned to the fields. The food the farmer uses to feed his animals includes sugar beet, pulp, silage,and hay. In the afternoon the animals are rounded up and fed, the poultry returned to the coup and the dogs put in their kennels. Then the farmers day is over.In the busy Spring and{Summer}months the farmer has to find time to plough and{harvest}the crop of hay and silage.
